title: I want to become wealthy through stocks. What should I study? - Quora

response.answer_text: No one becomes wealthy through stocks. Wealthy people buy and sell stocks. So do average middle class people. They all mostly stay right where they are. More of them lose their shirt than beat the market by any significant factor.  Beyond that it doesn't much matter what you study. Assuming felony larceny is not offered as a major at your local business school it's more about who you know.  Here's another approach. Pick a much, much smaller goal, something you can achieve in less than five years. Get that done. Rinse, repeat.

You should study   portfolio management and treasury and fund management as you majors in   university, this will help you understand more about where to invest and   when, take help from this interesting write up,  http://www.researchomatic.com/accounting-for-treasury-stock-183205.html  . You may also certifications, there are several quality institutes offering   diplomas and certifications, here have a look, you will understand which   certificate you can opt for, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Professional_certification_in_financial_services#Chartered_Alternative_Investment_Analyst.
